propDescriptions.children: The Toolbar children, usually a mixture of IconButton, Button and Typography. The Toolbar is a flex container, allowing flex item properites to be used to lay out the children.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

gutters.description: Styles applied to the root element unless {{conditions}}.

regular.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

dense.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.
